text_logic_form: Find the length of the line segment RT.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the length of the line segment RT.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line segment ST is 12 + x units.
The length of the line segment SR is 4x - 4 units.
The length of the line segment RT is 3x + 3 units.
The length of the line segment SR is equal to the length of the line segment RT.
line_instances: There are lines SR, ST, RT.
